1407.name: FAILED_DHCP
1407.message:
Unable to connect to a network
device, such as a router or modem.

Please check whether the IP-address
settings are correct under the Internet
option in System Settings.

Please refer to the manual for your
network device and check that the
IP-address-allocation settings are
correct as well.
1407.short_description: The console failed the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol and was unable to obtain an IP address.
1407.long_description: (WII LAN ADAPTER) The console failed the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol and was unable to obtain an IP address.
1407.short_solution: Check the Wi-Fi settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly. Power cycle your modem/router.
1407.long_solution: Check the Wi-Fi settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly. Power cycle your modem/router. Ensure the Wii LAN Adapter is installed correctly. You may also need to manually set an IP address for the console.
